titleStmt.title: On the death of Sir Tho. Armstrong in ansvver to a late treasonable libel dispers'd by the factions.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Nath. Thompson at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: Armstrong was executed for his part in the Rye House Plot.
Verse - "Thou monster Armstrong, cou'd thy soul return".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
